title: Tarragon vinaigrette
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon Dijon mustard', '2 tablespoons caster sugar', '5 tablespoons white vinegar', '1 clove garlic', '1 teaspoon salt', '75ml vegetable oil', '175ml water', '1/8 teaspoon celery seed', '1/8 teaspoon red chilli flakes', '1/2 teaspoon cracked black pepper', '3/4 teaspoon dried tarragon', '3/4 tablespoon brown mustard seed']
